content.rendered:
WELCOME TO MALCO VIDYALAYA

50 years of education to society Classes from Pre-Kg to Twelfth Standard with 3000 Students & 117 Staff.Built in 12 Acres in the Mettur hillock.
Apply Now!
Who we are

Malco Vidyalaya

MALCO VIDYALAYA MATRIC HSS was established in 1972 and the Pvt manages it. Unaided management and located in a semi-urban area. It falls under the NANGAVALLI block of the SALEM district of Tamil Nadu. The School is counted among the top-rated Schools in Tamil Nadu with excellence.

Discover more

40+ Years of History

The School is well known for its excellent academic track record.

Scholarship Facility

100% fee concession for top 10 meritorious students admitted in Class XI.

Books & Library

E-Library and Magazines and Around 3600 + books of all kind is available for all.

Certified Teachers

Teaching with empathy to reach students and increase positive learning outcomes.

Study at Malco Vidyalaya

  • Visual learning, animated multimedia lessons
  • Quick and immersive learning
  • Progressive improvement in core student learning
  • High Overall School Performance

Campus Life & Community

The backbone of our school’s infrastructure is the classroom. There are adequate classrooms and they look pleasant with good painting and decorations. The walls have built-in cupboards for keeping books and other important things.

ABOUT US

The school situated in Malco Campus is sponsored by MALCO Educational trust. The Management of Madras Aluminium Co., Ltd., is extending its generous support to the school. It is aimed to make the institution serve the members of all strata of the community and help them achieve a high standard of excellence and be able to enter prestigious institutions of higher learning in all fields.

Graduates
0
Student Campuses
0
Certified Teachers
0
Discover more
WELCOME TO MALCO VIDYALAYA
50 years of education to society
Classes from Pre-Kg to Twelfth Standard with 3000 Students & 117 Staff.Built in 12 Acres in the Mettur hillock.
Discover more

Majors, minors & graduate programs

1978 CBSE – X First Batch Exams 400

1980 CBSE – XII First Batch Exams 450

1983 CBSE to Matriculation Conversion 650

1988 Main Building Ist Floor Construction 800

1991 Shri Ramakrishna Auditorium & Shri Rangaswami Naidu Building

1998 Silver Jubilee Building

2000 Kalaimaghal Arangam replacing tiled roofs; 2 Computer Labs Inaugurated

2004 Expansion of Computer Lab – by 20 Nos

2008 Introduction of NCC

2009 Renovation of School Building, School Parent communication-bulk SMS system Introduction of Pre KG.

2011 CBSE Building.

Malco Vidyalaya is offering professional courses and arts courses for students of class 11.

COMMERCE

Subjects: English, Tamil, Economics, Accountancy, Business Studies, Mathematics/ Informatics Practices

Maths-Computer

Subjects: Tamil, English, Mathematics, Computer Science, Physics, Chemistry.

Maths-Biology

Subjects: Tamil, English, Mathematics, Biology, Physics, Chemistry.

Through creativity, collaboration and inclusion, we seek and solve problems to improve life on earth.

Discover more

Why Choose Malco Vidyalaya

Your children deserve an opportunity to achieve their dreams to the fullest. We unlock the doors to all-round holistic excellence at MALCO VIDYALAYA

 
Scholarship Facility

We are providing 100% fee concession for the top 10 meritorious students admitted in Class XI to encourage the students.

Skilled Lecturers

Teaching with empathy and a student-centered approach to reach more students and increase positive learning outcomes.

Book Library & Store

Our library is well-equipped to support and facilitate the teaching, learning, and research programs of the Institute.

Our History

MALCO VIDYALAYA MATRIC HSS was established in 1972 and it is managed by Unaidedmanagement and located in the SALEM district of Tamil Nadu. The School is well known for its excellent academic track record.

Over 100 Faculties

Depth of study: "Creativity in argument and invention." Independence of mind. Ambition for real quality. These are the keynotes of our approach to education. We hope our students will embrace them with energy.

We Have 3000 Students

Malco Vidyalaya School students will be encouraged to integrate effectively into the local, national and international communities through the diverse opportunities that are afforded to them.

OUR EXPERIENCED STAFFS

Malco Vidyalaya has well trainned faculties with years of experience. They support the students with their guidance.

Discover more

Easy Step to Apply

01
